concept.title: Using an HBase User
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the destination to use an HBase user to write data to HBase.

conbody.p: HBase destinationusing an HBase user to write to HBaseBy default, the uses the user account who started it to connect to external systems. When using Kerberos, the uses the Kerberos principal. Very similar to the Hadoop FS User (origin & dest) topics. Check all for updates.

To use an HBase user to connect to HBase, perform the following tasks:
On HBase, configure the user as a proxy user and authorize the user to impersonate the HBase user.
For more information, see the HBase documentation.
In the HBase destination, enter the HBase user name.
